ingredients.ingredient: 1 (13.75 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 (7 ounce) jar roasted red peppers, drained and chopped

cookingTips: Chop artichokes and peppers into small, uniform pieces for even distribution
Combine all ingredients and bake at 350°F for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden on top
Serve warm with pita chips, crackers, or fresh vegetables
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand the Mediterranean flavor profile and suggest complementary dippers and serving presentations.
